text: The 2019–20 Melbourne Boomers season is the 37th season for the franchise in the Women's National Basketball League (WNBL). Deakin University are again the Boomers' naming rights partner, after signing a two-year extension in November 2017. ==Roster== ==Standings== ==Results== ===Pre-season=== {|class="wikitable"
